title: Mirror Mirror on the Wall Capture the Best “Mirror Selfie” to Win a Trip to Korea! – Samsung Newsroom Malaysia
text:
Samsung Newsroom's videos will no longer be supported on Internet Explorer. Please try a different type of web browser.  This site uses cookies. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.   Kuala Lumpur, 27th September 2018 – Attention all beauty enthusiasts! Do you want to be a part of a prominent beauty show, where you can learn all the K-beauty skills and secrets from your favourite Korean celebrities and experts, and take your selfies to the next level? If the answer is yes, here’s your chance! Through its Mirror Mirror Me Selfie contest, Samsung Malaysia Electronics is giving you the opportunity to be the next “Better Girl” and star on the popular Get it Beauty reality TV show.  “We believe everyone regardless of background, age, or upbringing; has the potential to unlock the finest version of themselves. All they need is the right key, and what better way to do that than through South Korea’s number one beauty show itself? ‘Get it Beauty’ has helped many fans be the best that they could be, and we want to send the most dedicated Malaysian fans to personally be a part of it. Don’t miss this opportunity to learn the beauty secrets and skills from your favourite K-celebrities and experts!” said Yoonsoo Kim, President of Samsung Malaysia Electronics.  With just a few simple steps, you could stand a chance to be a part of the “Get It Beauty Better Girls School” TV reality show with South Korean actor Jung Hae-In!   50 top winners will be announced via Samsung Malaysia’s official website and social media to attend an exclusive event in Kuala Lumpur together with one friend. They will enjoy the full K-beauty experience from make-up and hair do, self-styling, to best picture shoots. Besides learning the makeup tips from the local beauty experts and influencer, they will also have a small meet-and-greet session with a mysterious but well-known South Korean star. Last but not least, three of these 50 winners will win an all-expense paid trip to South Korea, be on TV as a “Better Girl” on Get it Beauty with Jung Hye-In, and receive 4 days (3 nights) of K-beauty training from top celebrities and beauty experts of the programme.  What are you waiting for? 10,000 beauty kits from prominent beauty brands also will be given to the participants across the country, so pick up any Samsung Galaxy smartphone today and start posing for the best mirror selfie! Don’t miss this chance to be a part of this glamorous experience. Contest starts today 27th September, and ends on 21st October 2018.
